examples.example: 每次去医院检查身体，我都对自己的健康状况更加了解和放心。

translate.english: Every time I go to the hospital for a physical examination, I have a better understanding and reassurance of my own health condition.

examples.example: 老师认真地检查同学们的作业，以便更好地指导大家进步。

translate.english: The teacher carefully checks the students' homework so as to better guide everyone to make progress.

examples.example: 警察仔细地检查过往车辆，以确保道路交通安全。

translate.english: The police carefully inspect the passing vehicles to ensure the safety of road traffic.
